original_text: Then Abdon son of Hillel died and was buried at Pirathon in Ephraim, in the hill country of the Amalekites.
korean_text: 비라돈 사람 힐렐의 아들 압돈이 죽으매 에브라임 땅 아말렉 사람의 산지 비라돈에 장사되었더라

sentences.original_text: Then Abdon son of Hillel died
and was buried at Pirathon in Ephraim
in the hill country of the Amalekites
